org.jivesoftware.smackx.carbons

Class CarbonManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jivesoftware.smack.Manager
      • org.jivesoftware.smackx.carbons.CarbonManager

  • public class CarbonManager
extends Manager
    Packet extension for XEP-0280: Message Carbons. This class implements the manager for registering CarbonExtension support, enabling and disabling message carbons. You should call enableCarbons() before sending your first undirected presence.

      • isSupportedByServer

        public boolean isSupportedByServer()
                            throws XMPPException,
                                   SmackException
        Returns true if XMPP Carbons are supported by the server.
        Returns:
        true if supported
        Throws:
        SmackException - if there was no response from the server.
        XMPPException

      • sendCarbonsEnabled

        public void sendCarbonsEnabled(boolean new_state)
                        throws SmackException.NotConnectedException
        Notify server to change the carbons state. This method returns immediately and changes the variable when the reply arrives. You should first check for support using isSupportedByServer().
        Parameters:
        new_state - whether carbons should be enabled or disabled
        Throws:
        SmackException.NotConnectedException

      • setCarbonsEnabled

        public void setCarbonsEnabled(boolean new_state)
                       throws SmackException.NoResponseException,
                              XMPPException.XMPPErrorException,
                              SmackException.NotConnectedException
        Notify server to change the carbons state. This method blocks some time until the server replies to the IQ and returns true on success. You should first check for support using isSupportedByServer().
        Parameters:
        new_state - whether carbons should be enabled or disabled
        Throws:
        XMPPException.XMPPErrorException
        SmackException.NoResponseException
        SmackException.NotConnectedException

      • getCarbon

        public static CarbonExtension getCarbon(Message msg)
        Obtain a Carbon from a message, if available.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • disableCarbons

        public static void disableCarbons(Message msg)
